education.school: United College of Engineering and Reaearch
education.description: I am Pursuing Bachelor Of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering from United College of Engineering and Reaearch (Greater Noida). A highly reputed college in Greater Noida, I have an average of all semester in  B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering is CGPA of 8 out of 10.

I am a former student of New Standard Public School, Tripula Reacbareli. I have completed my Intermediate with PCM with Computer Science from New Standard Public School. I have secured an aggregate of 87% during the academic year.
